price: ډېر لوی او لوړ دى هغه ذات چې د هغه په لاس کې پاچاهي ده او هغه پر هر شي واکمن دى.
arabic: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱلَّذِي بِيَدِهِ ٱلۡمُلۡكُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: tabāraka alladhī biyadihi al-mul'ku wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
